# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a feature value containing a double-precision floating-point value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ value: Double)
```

## Creating a sendable feature value

- **init(undefined:)**: Creates an undefined feature value of a specific type.

items.description: Creates an undefined feature value of a specific type.
